mapper.select: SELECT tc.id, tc.customer_id AS customerId, c.customer_name AS customerName, c.gender, c.customer_group AS customerGroup, c.id_card AS idCard, c.phone, c.address, ST_X(c.location) AS latitude, ST_Y(c.location) AS longitude, tc.is_archived AS isArchived, tc.crm_customer_id AS crmCustomerId, tc.create_time AS createTime FROM grid_tingtang_customer tc LEFT JOIN grid_customer c ON tc.customer_id = c.id AND c.deleted = 0 WHERE tc.id = #{id} AND tc.deleted = 0

SELECT tc.id, tc.customer_id AS customerId, c.customer_name AS customerName, c.gender, c.customer_group AS customerGroup, c.id_card AS idCard, c.phone, c.address, ST_X(c.location) AS latitude, ST_Y(c.location) AS longitude, tc.is_archived AS isArchived, tc.crm_customer_id AS crmCustomerId, tc.create_time AS createTime FROM grid_tingtang_customer tc LEFT JOIN grid_customer c ON tc.customer_id = c.id AND c.deleted = 0 WHERE tc.deleted = 0
AND c.customer_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{customerName}, '%')
AND c.phone LIKE CONCAT('%', #{phone}, '%')
ORDER BY tc.create_time DESC
